# Padded
## Overview
Little more than heavy, quilted cloth, this armor provides only the most basic protection.

| *Light armor* |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Padded | 5 gp | +1 | +8 | 0 | 5% | 30 ft. | 20 ft. | 10 lbs. |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 151
